Wiki Module
===========
The wiki module provides a simple wiki engine with a patch-based history system, a collaborative infinote editor with
webworker-based markdown parser and an example plasmoid graph visualization widget. Plans are to extend the wiki with RDF
support and a p2p search engine at some point.


Code References
---------------

   :members:
   :show-inheritance:
